game.title: A Test Quest
game.description: The villagers are being terrorized by a giant. Travel to the forest and defeat him.

task.objective: Speak to Grimmoire the Wise at the Village Square.
task.description: Grimmoire will provide more information on the giant and his location.

task.objective: Travel to the Forest of Shadows.
task.description: The forest is located to the north of the village.

task.objective: Find and defeat the Giant in the forest.
task.description: The giant is a powerful foe. Bring some allies or powerful weapons to aid you.
task.location: Deep within the Forest of Shadows
